title: misc.
content:
Add root privileges
```
sudo chown root:root /path/to/app
sudo chmod 4755 /path/to/app
```

<hr>

Change JAVA under Manjaro
```
sudo archlinux-java set java-8-openjdk
```

<hr>
Temporarily Disable lid-switch

```
systemd-inhibit --what=handle-lid-switch sleep 1d
```

<hr>

Turn OFF monitor:

```
xset dpms force off
xset dpms force on
```
